content:
Posted: November 27, 2016
												Fun game, don't get me wrong. But I can't recommend it at this price point. There are only 3 levels... After level 3 it just takes you back to the beginning. Each level is quite short as well. Evolution VR is free and has more content than this. The price for this game should not exceed $5 with this amount of content in my humble opinion.My video on the game: 


YouTube™ Video: BEJEWELED LIKE GAME IN VIRTUAL REALITY | Fatal Gem VR Gameplay (HTC Vive VR) 

			Views: 83		

			This new gem matching puzzle game is the first of its kind that I've played on the Vive. Content is rather shallow but it's still pretty fun!
